name: Goliath Hangar
desc:
The original Invictus hangar bay is massive by sector standards, but still not large enough to support a large population's needs. To remedy this, the compartments above it have been slowly removed over time, leaving plentiful space for additional nanoforge capacity to be brough online.

The already Vast Hangar of a stock Invictus has been expanded, increasing the number of LPC slots from 2 to 4 if Converted Hangar is installed. However, this arrangement is awkward and incapable of high volume operations, increasing fighter replenishment time by 25% should the bonus be applied.
short: Increases the effect of Converted Hangar and removes most of its penalties.

name: Handwrought Armor
desc: Nearly a half-century of minor but constant modifications and repair to the Wandering Pilgrim's outer hull has resulted in an armor scheme completely different to that of the original Invictus. Subpar material and construction quality reduces total armor by 5000, but the new layers have been constructed with modern knowledge of armor schemes, entirely negating the effects of the ablative armor hullmod.
